

- MVC Search Scaffolding - v0.1.4 2015/08/06
====================================================================================
To scaffold Search CRUD for a class on the Package Manager Console type the following:

After creating EF database you must add a DbContext generator


For further information about the MVC Scaffolder upon which this is based refer to:

http://blog.stevensanderson.com/2011/01/13/scaffold-your-aspnet-mvc-3-project-with-the-mvcscaffolding-package/
